post.desc:
The [**panel**](https://mangadex.org/chapter/6104168d-47df-4130-a890-d3a99d62811e/2) in question.

And you know, from my impression of Shō's lines in Japanese so far – she seems to be the polite kind? Like, not at all rowdy from looking like a tiger or being an avatar of a war god.

But I can't be sure yet if it's a few fan authors' specific thing or not. She does sound very polite in [**Lost Word**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ZeAQFmiOzA) though.
